0.2.4.name: wordpress/linksharerss-ads
0.2.4.description:
LinkShare Dealfeed uses streams of offers from LinkShare Advertisers to automatically populate your Wordpress blog with deals and other promotional content. You can earn a commission on every sale on an Advertiser site that your blog refers. Just set up the plug-in once, and then your Wordpress site will automatically display the latest promotional information provided by the Advertiser.

IMPORTANT - Please note that you'll need to join the LinkShare Network and be approved into an Advertisers affiliate program in order to display the feed and earn a commission on sales.

LinkShare is a leading Performance Marketing Network that offers you access to partnerships with hundreds of top Advertisers.
